evidence.text: The motion to stay is DENIED.

extracted.value: The court denied Defendants’ motion to stay on May 6, 2025.

evidence.text: The Court declines to stay this case for the following reasons.

extracted.value: The court declined to stay the case on May 6, 2025.

evidence.text: Plaintiffs’ motions for preliminary injunctions will both be denied.

extracted.value: The court denied Plaintiffs’ motions for preliminary injunctions on June 3, 2025.

evidence.source_document: Memorandum in Opposition to Plaintiff's Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: Plaintiffs’ motion for preliminary injunction is DENIED.

extracted.value: The court denied Plaintiffs’ motion for preliminary injunction on June 3, 2025.

evidence.text: UPON CONSIDERATION of Defendants’ motion to stay proceedings in this action, and the entire record herein, it is hereby ORDERED that Defendants’ motion is GRANTED; and it is further, ORDERED that this matter is STAYED pending the hearing and determination of the plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction in Ass’n for Ed. Fin. & Policy v. McMahon, Civ. A. No. 25-999 (TNM).

extracted.value: The court granted Defendants’ motion to stay proceedings on an unspecified date, ordering the case to be stayed pending the hearing and determination of Plaintiffs’ motion for a preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: The Court GRANTS the parties' 29 Joint Motion for Briefing Schedule and sets the following deadlines. The current answer deadline of June 30, 2025, is VACATED. Plaintiffs' amended complaint is due by July 21, 2025. Defendants' motion to dismiss is due by September 18, 2025. Plaintiffs' opposition is due by October 9, 2025. Defendants' reply is due by October 30, 2025. SO ORDERED. Signed by Judge Trevor N. McFadden on 6/30/2025.

extracted.value: The court granted the parties’ 29 Joint Motion for Briefing Schedule on June 30, 2025, setting new deadlines for the case.

evidence.text: ORDER DENYING Defendants' 16 Motion to Stay. See attached Order for details. Signed by Judge Trevor N. McFadden on 5/6/2025.
